DOC.brief_summary: The primary purpose study demonstrate lot-to-lot consistency 3 production lot GSK Biologicals ' Hib-MenAC ( Haemophilus influenzae type b meningococcal serogroups A C ) vaccine reconstitute Tritanrix™-HepB ( diphtheria , tetanus , pertussis , hepatitis B ) vaccine administer single injection .
DOC.brief_title: Lot-to-lot Consistency Tritanrix™-HepB/Hib-MenAC & Its Non-inferiority vs Tritanrix™-HepB/Hiberix™ Infants
DOC.detailed_description: The study double blind . However active control vaccine Tritanrix™-HepB/Hiberix™ administer single-blind manner . Blood sample collect immunogenicity analysis . GSK Biologicals ' OPV vaccine administer concomitantly study vaccine 2 , 4 6 month age accord local country regulation . The study last approximately 5 month per subject

History OR previous vaccination OR know exposure since birth diphtheria , tetanus , pertussis , hepatitis B , Haemophilus influenzae type b and/or meningococcal disease .
